action.action-desc: Mr. Burchett (for himself and Mr. Bishop) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to include education on trailer safety in State highway safety programs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Trailer Safety Improvement Act.

Section 402(a)(2)(A)(xiv) of title 23, United States Code, is amended by inserting , prevent improper and unsafe use of light-duty and medium-duty trailers, and educate the public about required trailer safety equipment and preventive maintenance after unsecured vehicle loads.
